title: Capture Lover
overview: Ding Junjie is the deputy manager of the marketing department of a company, and his subordinate Ying Jiaming is the son of the chairman. After Ying Jiaming came to the company, his working attitude was very bad. Ding Junjie was helpless. He had to fight against Ying Jiaming. Ying Jiaming has an ex-girlfriend whose name is Zhang Fengxia. To get rid of Zhang Fengxia, Ying Jiaming begs Ding Junjie to pretend to be his boyfriend and say he is gay. Unexpectedly, in the process of getting along with each other, they developed love...
